translation: O King, remembering this wonderful and holy dialogue between Krishna and Arjuna, I continually rejoice.
commentary: 18.76 Rajan O King? Samsmritya having remembered? Samsmritya having remembered? Samvadam the dialogue? Imm this? Wonderful wonderful? between Kesava and Arjuna? Punyam holy? I rejoice (I) rejoice? f and? Muhuh again? Muhuh again.Commentary Rajan King Dhritarashtra to whom the Gita is narrated by Sanjaya.Punyam Holy because the mere hearing of the dialogue destroys a multitude of sins and makes the hearer pious and Godfearing and turns his mind towards God.
